channel.title: Free, Smf forum, like this, for your server forum, NO ADS! We will make
channel.description:
I make good smf forums (like this one) It is the same layout. Different Theme. I thought it might be good for people with servers that want a forum that is easy to use because they have had prior Xp with a forum.
This is how i will do it: Send an email or Pm me. (email moparscape.forums@gmail.com) In that mail, please include: Your Server name (I.E earthscape) The Title you want your forum to have What other features you may want.. (Eg: The Karma (Rep) System.) Email Address And username you would like
After i finish making it, i will send you a email with: Username & Paswords (you may change them) And a brief note of what to do and how to edit it.
I have made some of the big server forums for people. (www.earthscape.co.nr)
I hope this helps you and makes your server popular. Thanks
Ikick (Also known as Mod Ikick to some)
